attributes.comment:
Having been through an international adoption almost 2 years ago, I can personally
state that increasing the USCIS fees related to bringing home a child would
seriously cause families hardship. International adoption is costly as it is, in
financial and emotional terms, without these governmental fees being increased. If
we could see something tangible for the increase - such as a decrease in the
amount of paperwork or a shorter wait time for processing - then perhaps the fee
increase would make sense; however, I doubt this will be the case.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Anonymous
